name: Adventure De Kognitive
description:
Adventure de Kognitive

Adventure de Kognitive is a top-down roguelike game that simulates the life of a sales representative at Kognitive Sales Solutions, selling Mastercards to customers. Your objective is to reach your sales targets within a given timeframe by persuading customers with different personalities, needs, and preferences to sign up for the card.

The game features fixed levels with unique challenges and obstacles, rival sales representatives, and retro-style graphics and dynamic music. You control your character with the WASD or arrow keys and interact with objects and characters using the mouse or keyboard. Adventure de Kognitive tests your sales skills, strategic thinking, and resilience while offering an engaging and immersive gameplay experience.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys - move the character

Run into characters to interact with objects and characters

Supported Platforms

Windows, MacOS and Linux

Credits
